join_the_minig_of: Join the mining of the first human-centric cryptocurrency
import_your_private_key_backup: Import your private key backup to sign in
enter_your_private_key_backup: Enter your private key backup. You can export your private key from Idena app (see Settings page).
save_encrypted_key: Save the encrypted key on this computer
invalid_key_password: Key or password is invalid. Try again.
access_to_shared_node_will_expired: Access to the shared node will be expired after the validation ceremony {{nextValidation}}
you_can_node_desktop: You can run your own node at your desktop computer.
enter_password_to_unlock: Enter password to unlock your account
remove_private_key_from_computer: Remove private key from this computer
enter_invitation_code_free_node_or_skip: Enter an invitation code to get a free shared node connection or skip it to enter the invitation code later
enter_invitation_code_free_node: Enter an invitation code to get a free shared node connection
node_unavailable_contact_owner: This node is unavailable. Please contact the node owner:
api_key_expired: API key is expired. You cannot use the node for the upcoming validation ceremony
create_new_password_export: Create a new password to export your private key
scan_qr_mobile: Scan QR by your mobile phone or copy code below for export privatekey.
solve_more_filps: Solve more than 12 flips to become Verified
you_need_verified_status_terminate: You need to get Verified status to be able to terminate your identity and withdraw the stake
you_need_verified_status_locked: You need to get Verified status to get the locked funds into the normal wallet
in_oder_withdraw_stake: In order to withdraw the stake you have to terminate your identity
your_node_offline_more_than_hour: Your node was offline more than 1 hour. The penalty will be charged automaically. Once it's fully paid you'll continue to mine coins.
submit_optinal_flips: You can also submit optional flips if you want.
can_not_submit_flips_try_again: You can not submit flips. Please get validated first.
can_not_start_validation_because_not_act: Can not start validation session because you did not activate invite
can_not_start_validation_because_npt_sub: Can not start validation session because you did not submit flips.
